publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4787 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow Gaelic School Funding—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of funding for the Glasgow Gaelic School, Sgoil Ghàidhlig Ghlaschu, which will help to further the progress that has been made in Gaelic-medium education in Glasgow; further congratulates the staff and parents for their dedication in bringing about that success, and also acknowledges the efforts of Glasgow City Council education department in helping to create the largest school in Scotland covering Gaelic nursery, primary and secondary teaching.
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Robert Brown*, Karen Whitefield*, Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Patricia Ferguson*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Rhoda Grant*
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Peter Peacock*, David Stewart*
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Linda Fabiani*, Johann Lamont*
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Liam McArthur* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-4787 Glasgow Gaelic School Funding (lodged on 4 September 2009) Cathy Peattie*
